name: nomAI
description: NOMAI's goal is to be the 'nexus' for on-chain intelligence in the emerging agentic space. By building around its existing custom data architecture stack; processing real-time and historical on-chain data into contextual high action insights, nomAI powers autonomous trading agents to outperform. nomAI seeks to define the next era of agent-driven decision-makingâ€”delivering analytical depth, strategic foresight, and competitive advantage in decentralized markets using on-chain data.
